h="80" w="160">This will randomize the X and Z rotation on the given chunk.</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">WORLD_SURFACE_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="76" w="344">This will make the tree generate on the first block it encounts that is not an air block. May not work with the nether generation type.</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This test if the block below is in the tag for "top soil"</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">tale_of_biomes:structure/shub/top</field><comment pinned="false" h="59" w="275">this should be the tag for your "top soil" in your tree generation script.</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="57" w="284">This will restrict the tree to the biome if a biome restriction is active.</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
